name: Ding Dong XL
overview: Ding Dong XL is a neon-infused one button arcade game. It is an addictive 'just-one-more-round' score attack that will test your reflexes. Ding and Dong between the top and bottom of the screen as you attempt to avoid obstacles, collect points, and smash helpful power-ups. Try to survive as long as you can! Simple one button controls, just pressing the Ding Dong button allows you to cross the screen from top to bottom or vice-versa. Wait for the proper timing and don't hit enemies.
